## Analysis
Here is my analysis.  

```{r}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
# Read data from CSV file

file <- "analysis/OrthoFindertable.csv"
if(file.exists(file)) {
  data <- read.csv(file)
  data[, 2] <- paste0("*", data[, 2], "*")
  kable(data, caption = "CSV Table", escape = FALSE, format = "html") %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE) %>%  
  row_spec(1:nrow(data), extra_css = "height: 50px;")
} else {
  print("File not found.")
}

```
